charges.charge_disposition: Date of imposition of judgment was 3/19/2002; The dft pleaded guilty to count One of the Information on 11/29/2001; PROBATION: The dft is hereby sentenced to probation for a term of 5 years; Standard and Special conditions of supervision are requeste d; CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA $100, Restitution $33,331.26 paid to Bank One Corporation; The court determined that the defendant does not have the ability to pay interest and it is ordered that the interest requirement is waived for t he restitution; Defendant is to pay a special assessment fee in the amount of $100 due immediately; Restitution is ordered in the amount of $33,331.26 due immediately; If dft is unable to pay the full amount immediately, the dft shall make payments of $100.00 or 10 percent of gross income, whichever is greater, while on supervision
